name: Human Rights
description: Human Rights is an interactive lyric video / toy, developed as a companion piece to the song 'Human Rights' by Monster Mansion. Players explore a set of scenes and objects that relate to self expression, while listening to the song, which was inspired by the 2017 Australian same-sex marriage vote.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Celeron® N4000 Processor (4M Cache, 1.1 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 605 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
